tif

Class DirectoryIFD.EntryIFD

  • java.lang.Object
    • tif.DirectoryIFD.EntryIFD
  • Enclosing class:
    DirectoryIFD

    public static final class DirectoryIFD.EntryIFD
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single Image File Directory (IFD) entry within a TIFF structure. Each EntryIFD encapsulates metadata such as tag ID, data type, count, raw bytes, and a parsed object representation. It is immutable and self-contained.
    Since:
    21 June 2025
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntryIFD

        public EntryIFD(Taggable tag,
                TifFieldType ttype,
                int length,
                int offset,
                byte[] bytes,
                java.nio.ByteOrder byteOrder)
        Constructs an immutable EntryIFD instance from raw bytes.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag descriptor
        ttype - the TIFF field type
        length - the number of values
        offset - the raw offset/value field
        bytes - the value bytes (may be null)
        byteOrder - the byte order used to interpret binary values

    • Method Detail

      • parseData

        private java.lang.Object parseData(java.nio.ByteOrder order)
        Parses the raw byte array into a typed Java object based on the TIFF field type.
        Parameters:
        order - the byte order used for parsing
        Returns:
        parsed data as Object, or null if parsing fails or input is absent
